title: Missing level 40 capsule
body:
I posted on this I think last night, still no response, so I figured I'm going to keep bringing this up because it's a really frustrating issue.

I got to level 40 the other day, and it said I had apparently received my level 40 capsule, but I had not. I just hit level 41 earlier and opened a Jax, 270 essence, and some other stuff I forgot, but my level 40 capsule is still completely missing from my loot, I can't find it. Others have apparently also had the same problem, and not just for level 40, but for other level capsules as well. Can I get any updates on this situation? I'm feeling particularly frustrated because the level 40 capsule appears to have been supposedly a larger capsule with more stuff in it, but I completely missed out.

replies.body:
Hey there, it looks like you opened your level 40 milestone on the 12th.  It rewarded you with:

- Taliyah Shard
- LeBlanc Shard
- Udyr Shard
- Legend Emote

Let me know if that clears things up!

Could you go to your collection page and check your emotes? If you see this emote, you might have already opened it without realizing it.
https://i.imgur.com/INJhuhG.png

If you don't see that emote, and don't see the capsule in your loot, I'm sure they'll be willing to help you with your issue.
I'm missing that emote, and it's not in my loot either. - Just hit lvl 40 (It was in my capsule, but didn't appear anywhere else).
I logged out and logged back in and it's there.
